channel.title: sklearn on 我的简单博客
channel.description: Recent content in sklearn on 我的简单博客

item.title: ml sklearn
item.description: 尝试 # $ pip install scikit-learn $ python3.10 >>> from sklearn.datasets import load_iris >>> from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression >>> data, y = load_iris(return_X_y=True) >>> clf = LogisticRegression(random_state=0, max_iter=1000).fit(data, y) >>> clf.predict(data[:2, :]) >>> clf.predict_proba(data[:2, :]) >>> clf.score(data, y) 查找操作记录 # cat ~/.python_history.
